oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mayor Beverly Briley’s birthday party, 1973 January
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A scene from Mayor Beverly Briley’s January 1973 surprise birthday celebration at the Davidson County Court House, Mayor’s Conference Room. Clifton Beverly Briley (January 11, 1914 - September 14, 1980) was the first mayor of the newly consolidated metropolitan government of Nashville and Davidson County. A Democrat, he served from 1963 to 1975. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 2.5 x 2.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Briley, Beverly, 1914-1980
